mean_en: (of a tumour or disease) that cannot be controlled and is likely to cause death; (formal) having or showing a strong desire to harm somebody
sentence: The tumor is malignant—we will have to remove it.
sentence_trans: 这是恶性肿瘤，我们必须切除它。
word_etyma: mali 恶、不良 + gn忍受 + ant 表示属于...的、具有...性质的 → adj.[医] 恶性的；有害的；有恶意的 n.保王党员；怀恶意的人
